title: Dropped into Another World… - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beastkin   Caring Protagonist   Cheats   Childcare   Cute Children   Cute Story   Depictions of Cruelty   Familial Love   Familiars   Farming   Godly Powers   Gods   Heartwarming   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Race Change   Transported to Another World
author: Honobonoru500   ほのぼのる500
description:
The main character was caught in a hero summoning and teleported into another world but was treated as a failure.

Another world? Magic? He doesn’t know them.

He got a lot of companions but he has no one to talk to….he made little friends, areh? Strongest?

The main character doesn’t know how to fight so he’ll live heartwarmingly in the forest.

Even so, he’ll protect his companions to the best of his ability from occasional troubles!>
